channel.title: CVE Feed for PerkinElmer -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for PerkinElmer -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-6911|2024-07-22T20:52:23.176Z -- perkinelmer -- processplus
item.description: Files on the Windows system are accessible without authentication to external parties due to a local file inclusion in PerkinElmer ProcessPlus.This issue affects ProcessPlus: through 1.11.6507.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-6912|2024-07-22T20:51:15.342Z -- perkinelmer -- processplus
item.description: Use of hard-coded MSSQL credentials in PerkinElmer ProcessPlus on Windows allows an attacker to login remove on all prone installations.This issue affects ProcessPlus: through 1.11.6507.0.
